documents.document: Gonna party by myself tonight because nobody wants to go out with me lol.

"What are you doing for Valentine's Day?"
Working.
Even now my mum hides my presents because she knows I go looking for them. Oops.
You might think you're being funny. Although I'm probably just there thinking wtf are you doing you junkie, but you'll never know.

Me: "My birthday is on Sunday"
Friends: " we know Veronica, it's only thing you've been talking about for the past week" 😂
That extra spoonful of coffee really does make a difference 🙄
When you still have an hour until you have to be awake by, but you can't get back to sleep.
When you're taking a snapchat at the shops and you forget you have your flash on. 😳😳
Maybe they weren't the toxic person, maybe it was you lol.
Why is there a crossfit sponsored ad on my Instagram timeline every day. I'll never go. You're marketing to the wrong girl.
First there's a heatwave then it pouring rain. Make up your mind Australia.
Afros are so mesmerising.
When you're mindlessly wasting time, then you realise you have to get up early tomorrow because it's Monday. Ugh, time to sleep, I guess.
Met the creepiest bouncer today. Who hires these people?
Hmmm.. what can I buy for myself on Valentine's Day. It's time to spoil myself. Again.. 😂
We found out where the dog lives and I miss him already lol
The first time in a while I've been asked for my ID. Thank you my love! 😂
He's so bloody cute 😍 https://t.co/bmdcjlGClC
Some random dog followed my dog home when I was walking him and now I don't know what to do with it.
I wonder if couples who put the date that they got together in Roman Numerals actually know Roman Numerals or just Googled it.
Nobody has asked me how my love life is going lately. Is this a good or a bad thing? Hahaha
When you eye off the best looking plate when you're dishing up the food you've just cooked and someone just grabs it. Heart broken 😂
My phone bill has always been due on the same date each month for the past 4 years. Now it's due 2 weeks earlier. What??
I have the duck song stuck in my head. Oh my.
How tall do you have to be before you're considered tall for your gender? 🤔
I feel like watching Criminal Minds.
When sales people try to sell hair straightening brushes to people who have straight hair naturally. 🙄 move along mate.
When your neighbour has a loud party on a Monday night and you just want to sleep. Shush please!!!! An oldie needs her rest.
When someone follows you on Twitter then blocks you for no apparent reason. What just happened lol
I took my dog outside so he could pee. It took him 10 minutes to choose where he wanted to go...
I found my Nintendo DS. Memories.
This couple in the oval looked like they were ready to make out, then they just start having this massive argument. What just happened? Lol
Drowning my sorrows away, but with water
It is what it is, you get what you give 🤔
When some of your favourite products go on sale. Time to bulk buy. #Food
I just realised I've never seen how 'How I Met Your Mother' ended and I'm so curious.
When you're waiting for someone but you're so hungry.. omggggg
Girl - "I hate everyone fml" Me - *lurks social media page* ohhhh she broke up with her boyfriend, again. 😂
When one of your Tweets has no interactions yet. I feel so offended lol.
When you're having a good dream and someone wakes you up.. ohh...
I like reading over my draft Tweets. They amuse me.
I don't want to make a big fuss over my upcoming birthday, but at the same time I want someone to throw a cheesy surprise party for me.
Do you just start hearing things when you're really tired but can't get to sleep.. 😒
I just cringe so much when I accidentally use conditioner first instead of shampoo.
Finally, a night where it doesn't feel like a sauna..
It makes me happy to see people who were f*cked around with finally settle for someone who treats them right. 😊
I think I've listened to my music too many times.. but I'm too fussy with finding new music.
When you look bad but the person you're crushing on says you look cute. Awkayyy, happy Veronica ☺️
I was looking at the picture I was tagged in on Facebook and I swear I do not look that shit in rl. Bad photography. 😂
Why would you marry a complete stranger 😱
I want to try Bailey's ice cream 😋
I saw this guy with an Elmo head motorbike helmet. Where can I buy one even though I'll probably never use it.
I swear there's like a time limit on my dog for how long I can hug him before he gets sick of me lol.
What a caterpillar lol.
Junkies should not be on the road. 🙈
When a movie made for kids makes you cry. Omg what is this?
I'm not sure why, but I just want to go to Melbourne lol.
When someone who was an enemy of yours from high school compliments you. "Thank you ☺️"
Donald Trump may be one of the most powerful people now. Although, what's he going to do when he turns every nation against the USA?
It's so hot that my protein bars melted. Now I'm sad.
Some of the Snapchat articles are actually pretty interesting to look at to pass time.
This weather though 😰
When you're lurking on an interesting account and they deactivate. But I haven't finished yet!
I just watched a video on how to turn a cucumber into a moving snake. Why is this recommended to me? 😳
When you're back to yourself. 😈
When your stomach sounds like a thunderstorm. "Shhh, it's almost 11 pm. I want to sleep."
When people are drink driving and Snapchatting at the same time. Cringe level 100.
When this new dessert place is opening up but it's in another state. Fml.
They're calling you darling 😂 https://t.co/435detn3fx
When the food video first looks so amazing but the final product looks like shit. Hmm, I'll pass.
I just want garlic dip with Lebanese bread and I'll be happy.
Taking a walK down memory lane. https://t.co/qrWpOCXtcr
When you're a savage but deep down you're a softy.
I think I'm losing my voice again 😭
I'm gonna turn off my auto correct soon. It's driving me crazy.
I never realised how noisey bats were until now. Shhh! I'm trying to get some sleep.
When the only thing in your life breaking your heart is onions. 😂

Me: "oh it's one of my side hoes messaging me now."
Friend: "Bs, the only person who messages you is your mum"
😭😂
I hate cheap chocolate lol
When mum approves of someone first go. Congrats
Looking back at photos from last night and thinking fk I wasn't even drunk when I took this photo. What happened? 😂
When there's more dancing in the line waiting to get in the club than there is in the actual club. Hahahaha what?
I still have quite a bit of money left after an amazing night out. Very proud of myself.
When someone is coughing near you, don't you fkn go anywhere closer to me 😂
There's people having their pre drinks on the train, offt 😂
To be savage or to be humble. That is the question.
It's taking like 10 years to tan my legs
My new sunscreen smells a bit like mango. I guess you could say I'm really happy.
"Train yourself to let go everything you fear to lose" - Yoda
My mum always used to tell me when I was a kid that dates were cockroaches and I believed her 😂
Some people just love the drama 😶
Why do certain things bother us when they shouldn't even be on our minds...
I actually miss my job so much. Holidays hurry up and be over lol
I'm actually really excited about NYE this year!
What if the people who have my Tweet notifications on are just receiving spam from me. Okay I'll stop, for now.
I look at what I Tweet sometimes, and I question my sanity.
I wonder if train drivers blast their music when they're driving the train and just pause it when they're making an announcement. 🤔
Accidentally starting piling up a huge shoe collection under my bed again. Whoops.
My phone has dropped too many times lately. I'm scared it'll crack soon
My mum calls Tinder, Tingle omggggg 😂why do I find this so funny?
